h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision
content: Things will get more difficult any time you see the crystal on his staff flare brighter. These brief flashes indicate a laser beam blast that you'll only have a moment to dodge or take considerable damage, and you'll have to deal with even more as time goes on. Early on, watch for a laser to shoot out as he creates projectiles rings before you start spinning your staff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
Things will get more difficult any time you see the crystal on his staff flare brighter. These brief flashes indicate a laser beam blast that you'll only have a moment to dodge or take considerable damage, and you'll have to deal with even more as time goes on. Early on, watch for a laser to shoot out as he creates projectiles rings before you start spinning your staff.
